info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 10:06AM MST until December 27 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing Snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibility in blowing snow reduced to as low as one half mile at times. * WHERE...Grant County. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times. The cold wind chills between 15 below and 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
